mapper.select: insert into play_result (`name` , camera_number , theme , environment , `time` , scene , scenery , people , role , camera_position , camera_movement , camera_position_direction , collect_music , music , visual_effect) values (#{name} , #{cameraNumber} , #{theme} , #{environment} , #{time} , #{scene} , #{scenery} , #{people} , #{role} , #{cameraPosition} , #{cameraMovement} , #{cameraPositionDirection} , #{collectMusic} , #{music} , #{visualEffect})
